price: Basi akamwomba Mola wake Mlezi akasema: Kwa hakika mimi nimeshindwa, basi ninusuru!
footnotes: Nuhu akamwomba Mola wake Mlezi akisema: Hakika mimi nimeshindwa na hawa watu wangu, basi wapatilize hawa kwa ajili yangu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
